posts.name: Sara Sariowan
posts.cooked:
CASINO CLASH 1545×2000 464 KB

CASINO CLASH 1545×2000 464 KB

CASINO CLASH 1545×2000 464 KB

Team 2485 Overclocked would like to present our third annual Fall CADathon, CASINO CLASH! Participants will have around 2.5 weeks to design a robot for a mock FRC game created by our team.

Kickoff/game release: 11/21/2024 at 7PM PST

CAD submission deadline: 12/8/2024 at 11:59PM PST

Anyone can participate, whether you’re working with your team, collaborating with other FRC students, or designing solo!

Join our CADathon Discord server for more information, updates, and resources.

Team 2485 Discord server link: 2485 CADathon

posts.name: Nick Soule
posts.cooked:
It’s time!

We’re releasing the 2485 2024 CADathon, Casino Clash! All the files for the game are in the google drive folder below. The field CAD is linked in the game manual and in this post. If you have any questions, please use the attached form. See the link to the discord server above for more information

Google Drive Folder:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1hDlC9SOpMcmeh-HhagM6s2SI8RmSExqg?dmr=1&ec=wgc-drive-hero-goto

Field CAD:

Sign in to Onshape, the #1 fastest growing CAD system in the world with over 4 million users.
